entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
